rules_text:
First strike
[i]Exalted Falchion[/i] – When Marth, First King enters, create the Exalted Falchion and attach it to him.
[i]The Fire Emblem[/i] – Other white creatures you control have vigilance, other blue creatures you control have flying, other black creatures you control have lifelink, other red creatures you control have haste, and other green creatures you control have reach.
Partner with Kris, First Avatar [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Kris into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
